original_text: And suddenly there was a great earthquake, so that the foundations of the prison were shaken: and immediately all the doors were opened, and every one's bands were loosed.
korean_text: 이에 갑자기 큰 지진이 나서 옥터가 움직이고 문이 곧 다 열리며 모든 사람의 매인 것이 다 벗어진지라

sentences.original_text: And suddenly there was a great earthquake
so that the foundations of the prison were shaken
and immediately all the doors were opened
and every one's bands were loosed
